Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by California in 1984...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1991, off Dwight Gooden (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1991, off Paul Hartzell (BOS)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1992, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1992...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 4/29/1993...
Hit for the cycle against Texas on 8/7/1993...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Detroit on 8/12/1993...
Injured on 4/8/1994 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Texas on 5/2/1994...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1994...
Injured on 6/21/1996 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1996...
Injured on 6/16/1997 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2-3 weeks...
